translation.description: Your one-stop interface to browse Malaysia's wealth of open data. This page will consistently grow in depth and breadth with high-quality data from federal and state agencies in Malaysia.
translation.description_agency: Your one-stop interface to browse open data from {{ agency }}. This page will grow over time as we expand the quality and quantity of our open data.
translation.description_opendosm: Your one-stop interface to browse our wealth of open data. This page will consistently grow in depth and breadth, providing richer and more varied data from the various divisions of DOSM.
translation.description_databnm: Multi-format downloads, exploratory dataviz, and programmatic access - pick your preferred method of freely using our data. Pay particular attention to the metadata to gain a deeper understanding of a dataset's scope, use, and limitations, and write to data@bnm.gov.my if you want to discuss or request anything further!

vector.title: Vector Graphic (SVG)
vector.desc: Suitable for high quality prints or further image editing.

csv.title: Full Dataset (CSV)
csv.desc: Recommended for individuals seeking an Excel-friendly format.

parquet.title: Full Dataset (Parquet)
parquet.desc: Recommended for data scientists seeking to work with data via code.

geojson.title: GeoJSON (JSON)
geojson.desc: Open standard format for plotting geographical features on maps.

translation.header_2: What caveats I should bear in mind when using this data?
translation.code_desc: Connect directly to the data with Python.

code_comments.geojson_1:
# the first URL gives you 15dp accuracy (highest possible) 
# the _LIGHT URL gives you 5dp accuracy, sufficient for visuals but not analysis 
# the _LIGHT URL is over 90% smaller in size, hence the tradeoff
code_comments.geojson_2: # Uncomment below to maintain a rectangular map, but remove the whitespace caused by the South China Sea
code_comments.geojson_3: # Uncomment below to change from rectangular --> square, for a more compact visual

sample_query.unavailable: This data catalog is not available through OpenAPI as the nature of the data makes it unsuitable for API access. For the full dataset, please use the provided download link as shown in the above section.
